item.title: Aakhri Aadmi (Abridged)
item.description: ** This is an abridged version of the story - see here for the full Urdu and full Hindi scripts and audio recording. Scroll below for the abridged version in the Urdu Script, as well as a list of key vocabulary. Aliyaasaf us shehr mein aakhri aadmi tha. Us ne ahad kia tha ke mabood ki saugand main aadmi ki juun mein paida hua hun aur main aadmi hi ki juun mein maroon ga.
